articles.title: George Conway: Donald Trump's Jan. 6 involvement 'reeks' of criminality - CNN Video
articles.description: Conservative attorney George Conway explains why Trump had criminal intent and is in "more legal trouble" after the third hearing of the January 6 committee

articles.author: Katelyn Polantz, CNN Reporter, Crime and Justice
articles.title: Peter Navarro pleads not guilty to contempt of Congress charges
articles.description: Former Trump White House trade adviser Peter Navarro pleaded not guilty to contempt of Congress charges on Friday after not cooperating with the House's ongoing January 6 investigation.

articles.title: Video: Fallen officer's partner addresses Ivanka Trump and Jared Kushner on air - CNN Video
articles.description: Fallen US Capitol Police Officer Brian Sicknick's partner, Sandra Garza, shares a message for Ivanka Trump and Jared Kushner as more details about the January 6 insurrection come to light during the House select Committee's public hearings.

articles.author: Jacqueline Howard, CNN
articles.title: FDA authorizes Covid-19 vaccines for younger children
articles.description: The Moderna and Pfizer/BioNTech Covid-19 vaccines are now authorized for emergency use in young children, but they can't be given until the CDC director signs off.

articles.author: Ivana Kottasová, Anna Chernova, Fred Pleitgen and Zahra Ullah, CNN
articles.title: Putin lambasts the West and declares the end of 'the era of the unipolar world'
articles.description: Russian President Vladimir Putin has declared the end of "the era of the unipolar world" in a combative speech that lambasted Western countries at St. Petersburg International Economic Forum on Friday.

articles.author: Rachel Ramirez and Brandon Miller, CNN
articles.title: The West just experienced an aspect of the climate crisis that scientists have warned of for years
articles.description: Drought conditions persisted in the Southwest, where water is desperately needed to replenish the country's largest reservoirs relied on by tens of millions of people.

articles.author: Jeremy Herb, Marshall Cohen and Zachary Cohen, CNN
articles.title: 8 takeaways from the January 6 hearings day 3
articles.description: The House select committee investigating the Capitol insurrection on Thursday detailed how former President Donald Trump tried to pressure his vice president to join in his scheme to overturn the presidential election -- and how Mike Pence's refusal put his l…

articles.author: Analysis by Stephen Collinson, CNN
articles.title: Analysis: January 6 committee wrestles with the same unsolvable question about Trump -- how to hold him to account
articles.description: On June 16, 2015, Donald Trump descended that famous golden escalator, unleashed a cacophonous presidential campaign by breaking every single rule of politics and barnstormed, welcome or not, into the soul and psyche of every American.
articles.content: (CNN)On June 16, 2015, Donald Trump descended that famous golden escalator, unleashed a cacophonous presidential campaign by breaking every single rule of politics and barnstormed, welcome or not, in… [+8092 chars]

articles.author: Opinion by Jill Filipovic
articles.title: Opinion: Mike Pence, come to your senses
articles.description: Jill Filipovic writes that while the January 6 hearings are painting a damning picture of what happened that fateful day -- and who bears responsibility -- they are making Mike Pence out to be a hero. That story, she argues, isn't quite true.
articles.content: Jill Filipovic is a journalist based in New York and author of the book "OK Boomer, Let's Talk: How My Generation Got Left Behind." Follow her on Twitter. The opinions expressed in this commentary ar… [+7797 chars]

articles.author: Chris Cillizza
articles.title: The 16 most compelling lines from today's January 6 committee hearing
articles.description: The third public hearing of the January 6 committee this month is in the books. It was heavily focused on the pressure campaign that Donald Trump brought to bear on Mike Pence to overturn the Electoral College results in advance of January 6, 2021.
